purpose: Facilitates the deployment and management of generative AI models and applications on AWS using CDK constructs.
principle: Utilizes AWS CDK to create reusable infrastructure components for deploying generative AI solutions, leveraging AWS services like SageMaker, Lambda, and Step Functions.
reusability: Offers modular CDK constructs that can be easily integrated into existing AWS infrastructure, promoting reusable and scalable AI deployments.
limitations: Primarily designed for AWS environments, may not be suitable for non-AWS platforms or on-premise deployments.
name: generative-ai-cdk-constructs
description: AWS Generative AI CDK Constructs are sample implementations of AWS CDK for common generative AI patterns.
highlight: Provides AWS CDK constructs for implementing common generative AI patterns using AWS services.
